sentences.en: Comprehensively , magnesium hydroxide filling amount of 100 was the best recommended value.
sentences.cn: 所以综合各因素考虑,氢氧化镁添加量为100份时最适宜.

sentences.en: Endocrine examination, water 17 ketone sterol, water 17 hydroxide steroid is normal.
sentences.cn: 内分泌检查, 尿17酮类固醇 、 尿17羟类固醇正常.

sentences.en: Lye - - spelled ly - e -- also called sodium hydroxide or potassium hydroxide.
sentences.cn: 碱,拼写为l -y-e,也称为氢氧化钠或者氢氧化钾.

sentences.en: Methanol. Methyl alcohol Carbinol. Wood alcohol. Wood spirit . Methyl hydroxide.

sentences.en: Objective : To further investigate the effects of calcium hydroxide for apexification.
sentences.cn: 目的: 进一步探讨氢氧化钙在根尖诱导成形术中的效果.

sentences.en: Precious metals: hydroxide precipitation and sedimentation plus precious metal recovery, e. g. evaporation, ion exchange, etc.

sentences.en: Sodium diacetate is synthesized by acetic acid and sodium hydroxide.
sentences.cn: 以醋酸-烧碱法合成双乙酸钠.

sentences.en: Sodium hydroxide in various forms is the most widely used.
sentences.cn: 各种形式的氢氧化钠是最广泛使用的.

sentences.en: The concentrated sodium hydroxide is filtered through a pressure filter.
sentences.cn: 浓缩过的氢氧化纳通过压滤机过滤.

sentences.en: The former includes graphite metallic disulfide etc; and the latter consists of layered silicate metallic double hydroxide etc.
sentences.cn: 前者包括石墨、金属硫化物等；后者包括层状硅酸盐、金属双氢氧化物等。

sentences.en: The potassium hydroxide electrolyte is forced into the cells just before use.
sentences.cn: 在开始使用前把氢氧化钾电介质压入蓄电池.

sentences.en: This work presented advanced techniques for preparing aluminium hydroxide sol by aluminium.
sentences.cn: 利用价格便宜的纯铝制备氢氧化铝溶胶.

sentences.en: Thus, sodium hydroxide was used in this work for the pretreatment of ramie fiber.
sentences.cn: 因此，氢氧化钠是在这项工作中所使用的预处理苎麻纤维。

sentences.en: Treated with methanol and potassium hydroxide, also known as lye, the vegetable oil molecules break down.
sentences.cn: 植物油分子经过甲醇和钾的氢氧化物、也被称作灰汁的处理后就被分解。

sentences.en: Water, acrylonitrile and the galactomannan gum are added to a reactor with an alkali metal hydroxide.
sentences.cn: 水 、 丙烯晴和半乳甘露聚糖胶,同碱金属氢氧化物在一起,加入到反应器中.
